thread.section_title: World Wide Stereo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of World Wide Stereo | worldwidestereo.com
thread.title: Keith
thread.title_full: World Wide Stereo reviewed by Keith

author: Keith
title: Keith
text: First time purchase. Ordered Sony's top turntable with DAC/USB. Got a great deal. Shipping was free AND lightning-fast: shipping notice received within an hour of purchase followed by FedEx notice and next-day delivery. Until they figure out how to send items through a Star Trek transporter, service doesn't get much better than this! Will definitely be a repeat customer.
